snippet: Justice Stephen J. Rooney recused himself from ruling on releasing grand jury transcripts, because of his wife’s ties to the hospital where Eric Garner was taken.
abstract: New York State Judge Stephen J Rooney, who oversaw grand jury proceedings in fatal police encounter of Staten Island man Eric Garner, is recusing himself from ruling on request to release transcripts of inquiry, citing potential conflict of interest involving his wife, who serves on board of hospital where Garner was taken.

byline.contributor: Al Baker and Benjamin Mueller contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Justice Stephen J. Rooney recused himself from ruling on releasing grand jury transcripts, because of his wife’s ties to the hospital where Eric Garner was taken.

headline.main: Judge Sits Out Decision on Eric Garner Transcripts
headline.print_headline: Judge Sits Out Decision on Garner Transcripts
